thread.title_full: Fantastic stay - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: claireaI1311FU
title: Fantastic stay - Review
text:
I was in London sitting an exam and was very pleased to have a nice spacious room where I could relax the night before.
My room was larger than average, very comfortable, and reliable room service for dinner and breakfast.
The hotel was also in a great location with lovely views of London landmarks when I left in the morning. I will definitely stay here again.
